page.title: 17A HEADTEACHER'S DAY PART 2
page.content: 9:00AM TO 1:15PM. 9:00 Registration then Assembly at 9:15 9:30 Return to classroom:phone call from Area Office. 10:00 visit from Architechts' Dept. 10:30 Morning break:open post,chat to clerical assistant. 10:45 Break over:Maths lesson,no callers! 12noon Lunch:supervise children in hall.Check that teacher on duty is present and that dinner-ladies are OK. Go to office,check post,draft replies. Another phonecall from Area Office.Grab lunch. 12:30 Child feeling ill:contact mum. 12:45 Coffee in staffroom with staff. Listen to any worries. 1:00pm Education Welfare Officer calls. 1:15 Afternoon school begins
